dct_title_s: Part IId. of the compleat map of the Holy-Land
dct_description_sm: by Samuel Dunn ; printed for Robt. Sayer.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Milliaria britannica" and "Mill. romana antiqua".
Shows topography, drainage, settlements, travel routes, territorial boundaries of the twelve tribes of Israel, places of historical interest.
Appears in Dunn's A new atlas of the mundane system. London, 1788, 3rd ed.
